PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Broad absorption , appropriate HOMO / LUMO positions , and comparable hole mobility make PSFDTBT a promising donor material in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Broad absorption |
| Appropriate HOMO / LUMO positions |
| Comparable hole mobility |
| PSFDTBT (a promising donor material) |
| BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Perovskite Solar Cells)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Broad absorption |
| Appropriate HOMO / LUMO positions |
| Comparable hole mobility |
| PSFDTBT (a promising donor material in BHJ PSCs) |

Note: In this context, "BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Perovskite Solar Cells)" is not a material property, but rather a type of solar cell technology where PSFDTBT is being used as a donor material. Therefore, it was removed from the table.
